problem.display_name: Electric Field of Two Point Charges

text.p: We have two point charges, one positively charged ([mathjaxinline]q_1=4\times10^{-9}[/mathjaxinline]C located at [mathjaxinline]x=0.8~[/mathjaxinline]m and [mathjaxinline]y=0.6~[/mathjaxinline]m) and one negatively charged ([mathjaxinline]q_2=-6\times10^{-9}[/mathjaxinline]C located at [mathjaxinline]x=0.8~[/mathjaxinline]m and [mathjaxinline]y=0.0~[/mathjaxinline]m). Find the electric field (magnitude and direction) at the origin due to these two charges.
